column1: 00:00|midnight|"""Perceptive as usual."" Webster set his cup aside and leaned forward
column2: bracing his forearms on his knees. ""The fact is
column3: Lucien Cortez is staying on as Fifth Space Lord

column5: and I'm here to get your input before I sign a few midnight command assignments."" He waved a hand at White Haven's raised eyebrow. ""Oh
